DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether treatment with Quetiapine Fumarate (SEROQUEL) in conjunction with mood stabilizers (Lithium or Divalproex) for 12 weeks helps patients who have Bipolar I Disorder with Alcohol Dependence
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Quetiapine Fumarate (SEROQUELÂ®) in the Treatment of Alcohol Dependency in Patients With Bipolar Disorder
DOC.criteria: Meets criteria for Bipolar I Disorder with Alcohol dependence Outpatient Status Recent history of heavy drinking Unstable medical illness Recent antipsychotic use Poorly controlled Diabetes Mellitus or Diabetes related illness
